descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#0099FF][b][u]MOD[/u][/b][/color][/center]
I edited for fun dragonbone bow texture and mesh, i tried to figure out something similar to Guild Wars eternal weapons i loved so much, i really like jade color on it.
This is a replacer, not a custom weapon.
[center][color=#0099FF][b][u]REQUIREMENTS[/u][/b][/color][/center]
Dawguard expansion
[center][color=#0099FF][b][u]INSTALLATION[/u][/b][/color][/center]
Drop it into your Skyrim main folder
author: Ayame
